NotFoundPage.title: Error: 404 page not found
NotFoundPage.message: Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be accessed

AboutPage.text: This application was created as part of the React course by RSSchool. If you also want todive into the world of IT and specifically into the world of frontend development,
AboutPage.rsLinkText: enroll in the frontend development course
AboutPage.descriptionEnd: ! We are a team of budding developers, unafraid of challenges and always moving forward. Our application is built to assist others by enabling requests to any open APIs. Whether you're making RESTful requests or diving into GraphQL, our platform is designed to empower your projects.

AuthForm.isSignInText: Don't have an account? Sign Up
AuthForm.isNotSignInText: Already have an account? Sign In

Welcome.description: If you want to try playground, please sign in or sign up

Validation.emailInvalid: Email must be in the format user@example.com
Validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Validation.passwordDigit: Password must contain at least 1 digit
Validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
Validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
Validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
Validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long
Validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 15 characters long

Toasts.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. You will be redirected to the main page
Toasts.userExists: User with this email is already registered
Toasts.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
Toasts.userDoesNotExist: User with these credentials does not exist. Please check the email and password
Toasts.manyRequests: Too many requests at the same time. Please try later
Toasts.logOutFail: Failed to log out. Please try again
